div.div: Chihiro Wamura is an unassuming otaku girl who happens to sit next to Kaname Rutou, the beautiful honor student. They don't have anything in common, until one day Rutou-san asked Wamura to take a selfie with her while in class?

After painstaking effort, fashion model Ars has achieved immense popularity. However, a genius named Meiko appears next to her.
Her overwhelming natural talent captures the world's attention. She doesn't want to lose. Ars is eager to compete, but Meiko's body has a certain problem...
Aiming for the top, she walks down the shining runway. To grasp glory. To leave proof that she lived. The girls' fiery radiance pierces their hearts, hot and cold!
